AIConfiguration.msdyn_customconfiguration:
{"version":"GptDynamicPrompt-2","prompt":[{"type":"literal","text":"As a Senior Sales Manager, analyze the provided company and lead information using publicly available sources.

Given the company name "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"CompanyName"},{"type":"literal","text":" and contact information"},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"ContactName"},{"type":"literal","text":" please use the public information about the company and the lead contact to create an outreach message offering relevant expertise. Please focus on the areas relevant specifically to the lead contact's department.

Objective: Generate a structured summary of the company and lead, focusing on:
- Software development activities
- Business and technical challenges
- Relevant hiring trends
- Areas for potential improvement

Sections to Include:
- Company — The company’s official name and brief summary of the company’s focus, key expertise, and primary software development services.
- Projects — List relevant software development projects, including Cloud, AI, DevOps, or other core technical areas. Include links when available.
- Vacancies — Identify technical job openings, highlighting hiring trends. Include job title, location, and description.
- News — Summarize recent company updates related to software development, product enhancements, or strategic initiatives. Exclude ads and unrelated announcements.
- Lead — Summarize lead’s assumed position, responsibilities, and influence in the company based on publicly available information.
- LeadPainPoints — Identify the lead’s potential challenges, inferred from their role, department, and LinkedIn posts.
 
Guidelines: 
- Use publicly available sources (company website, LinkedIn, industry news, etc.).
- Emphasize software development activities and technical expertise.
- Skip advertising and unrelated announcements.
- Include links whenever possible.
- Format the output as valid JSON, following this schema:
{
 “company”: { “name”: “CompanyName”, “description”: “”, “url”: “CompanyLinkedInUrl” },
 “projects”: [{ “name”: “”, “description”: “”, “url”: “” }],
 “vacancies”: [{ “title”: “”, “location”: “”, “description”: “”, “url”: “” }],
 “news”: [{ “title”: “”, “date”: “”, “description”: “”, “url”: “” }],
 “lead”: { “name”: “LeadName”, “url”: “LeadLinkedInUrl” },
 “leadPainPoints”: [{ “item”: “” }]
}

Additional Notes:
- Each array should ideally contain 7 to 10 elements, if possible.
- Ensure the summary is concise, relevant, and actionable.
- Avoid speculation — base insights on concrete data from verified sources."}],"definitions":{"inputs":[{"id":"CompanyName","text":"CompanyName","type":"text","quickTestValue":"Curinos"},{"id":"ContactName","text":"ContactName","type":"text","quickTestValue":"Brian Smith"}],"data":[],"output":{"formats":["json"],"jsonSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"company":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"url":{"type":"string"}}},"projects":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"url":{"type":"string"}},"required":["name","description","url"]}},"vacancies":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string"},"location":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"url":{"type":"string"}},"required":["title","location","description","url"]}},"news":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"title":{"type":"string"},"date":{"type":"string"},"description":{"type":"string"},"url":{"type":"string"}},"required":["title","date","description","url"]}},"lead":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string"},"url":{"type":"string"}}},"leadPainPoints":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"item":{"type":"string"}},"required":["item"]}}}},"jsonExamples":[{"company":{"name":"Curinos","description":"Curinos is a financial services consultancy that provides data-driven insights and solutions to help financial institutions optimize their performance. They specialize in areas such as benchmarking, customer experience, and digital transformation.","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/company/curinos/"},"projects":[{"name":"Digital Transformation","description":"Curinos assists financial institutions in their digital transformation journeys, focusing on enhancing customer experience and operational efficiency.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/digital-transformation"},{"name":"Benchmarking","description":"Curinos offers benchmarking services to help financial institutions compare their performance against industry standards and identify areas for improvement.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/benchmarking"},{"name":"Customer Experience Optimization","description":"Curinos provides insights and strategies to improve customer experience, leveraging data analytics and customer feedback.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/customer-experience"},{"name":"Data Analytics","description":"Curinos uses advanced data analytics to provide actionable insights for financial institutions, helping them make informed decisions.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/data-analytics"},{"name":"Market Research","description":"Curinos conducts market research to help financial institutions understand market trends and customer behavior.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/market-research"}],"vacancies":[{"title":"Senior Data Scientist","location":"New York, NY","description":"Responsible for developing and implementing data models to support client projects.","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/senior-data-scientist-at-curinos-1234567890/"},{"title":"Software Engineer","location":"Remote","description":"Develop and maintain software solutions for financial services clients.","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/software-engineer-at-curinos-1234567891/"},{"title":"Product Manager","location":"Chicago, IL","description":"Oversee the development and launch of new products in the financial services sector.","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/product-manager-at-curinos-1234567892/"},{"title":"Data Analyst","location":"Boston, MA","description":"Analyze data to provide insights and recommendations for client projects.","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/data-analyst-at-curinos-1234567893/"},{"title":"DevOps Engineer","location":"San Francisco, CA","description":"Implement and manage CI/CD pipelines to support software development projects.","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/devops-engineer-at-curinos-1234567894/"}],"news":[{"title":"Curinos Launches New Digital Banking Platform","date":"2023-09-15","description":"Curinos has launched a new digital banking platform aimed at enhancing customer experience and operational efficiency for financial institutions.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/news/digital-banking-platform-launch"},{"title":"Curinos Acquires Fintech Startup","date":"2023-08-10","description":"Curinos has acquired a fintech startup to expand its capabilities in data analytics and customer experience optimization.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/news/fintech-startup-acquisition"},{"title":"Curinos Partners with Leading Bank for AI Project","date":"2023-07-20","description":"Curinos has partnered with a leading bank to develop AI-driven solutions for improving customer service and operational efficiency.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/news/ai-project-partnership"},{"title":"Curinos Releases Annual Benchmarking Report","date":"2023-06-30","description":"Curinos has released its annual benchmarking report, providing insights into the performance of financial institutions across various metrics.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/news/benchmarking-report-2023"},{"title":"Curinos Hosts Webinar on Digital Transformation","date":"2023-05-25","description":"Curinos hosted a webinar discussing the latest trends and strategies in digital transformation for financial institutions.","url":"https://www.curinos.com/news/digital-transformation-webinar"}],"lead":{"name":"Brian Smith","url":"https://www.linkedin.com/in/brian-smith/"},"leadPainPoints":[{"item":"Keeping up with rapid technological advancements in the financial services industry."},{"item":"Ensuring data security and compliance with regulatory requirements."},{"item":"Optimizing customer experience through digital channels."},{"item":"Integrating new technologies with existing systems."},{"item":"Managing and analyzing large volumes of data to derive actionable insights."}]}]}},"modelParameters":{"modelType":"gpt-4","gptParameters":{"temperature":0}},"settings":{"recordRetrievalLimit":80,"shouldPreserveRecordLinks":true}}

{"version":"GptDynamicPrompt-2","prompt":[{"type":"literal","text":"Help to build an outreach message for a person working in a company [CompanyName] using the provided information about the company [CompanyName] and summary of the relevant expertise we offer. Here's the information about the company [CompanyName]:
1. Summary: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"ResearchSummary"},{"type":"literal","text":" 
2. Pain points: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"PainPoints"},{"type":"literal","text":" 
3. Specific technical expertise the company [CompanyName] would benefit from: "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"CoopTechBenefits"},{"type":"literal","text":" .

Summary of the relevant expertise:
"},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"RelevantExpertise"},{"type":"literal","text":" 

The outreach message should be written in business English and should be formed in the following way:
- one most relevant pain point should be selected from the pain points, the following alias will be used for further references to the selected pain point [PainPoint];
- the relevant expertise for [PainPoint] should be extracted out of the summary of the relevant expertise, the following alias will be used for further references to the extracted expertise [ExpertiseSummary];
- the outreach message should be formatted using the following structure:
 I see you're working on [PainPoint] and mage have gaps/struggles with [PainPoint].
 We did something similar for out of our clients. [ExpertiseSummary]
 We can help with [PainPoints].
"}],"definitions":{"inputs":[{"id":"ResearchSummary","text":"ResearchSummary","type":"text","quickTestValue":"Company info:
[CompanyName] is a live stream platform and marketplace that enables collectors and enthusiasts to connect, buy, and sell verified products.
Total employee count: 979
Locations: the US
33 job openings currently available 
201 engineers with 34% of growth per 1y
 
Products:
ProductA: Explore a wide range of Pokémon cards, from vintage collections to the latest releases.
ProductB: Discover collectible vinyl figures from various franchises, including limited editions.
ProductC: Find unique vintage apparel spanning various eras and styles.
ProductD: Browse through a variety of Lego sets, from classic collections to themed series.

The Products reviews:
The Products are highly regarded for their user-friendly interface, engaging live auction format, and diverse range of collectibles, making it a popular choice for both buyers and sellers. Users appreciate the sense of community fostered by real-time interactions. However, there are concerns about shipping delays, inconsistent seller verification, and occasionally unresponsive customer support. Overall, the platform offers a unique shopping experience but could improve in these areas to enhance user satisfaction.
 
Job openings:
- Software Engineer, Notifications. Experience building scalable systems (we primarily use Python, Elixir, JavaScript). Excellent product instincts. You first think about users rather than the best technical solution.

- iOS Engineer, Risk. iOS expertise in creating fluid, responsive user interfaces. Strong knowledge of Swift and adept at writing declarative code.

- Software Engineer, Machine Learning. Familiarity with cloud computing platforms and managed services such as AWS Sagemaker, Lambda, Kinesis, S3, EC2, EKS/ECS, Apache Kafka, Flink.Experience with operational, search, and key-value databases such as PostgreSQL, DynamoDB, Elasticsearch, Redis.
"},{"id":"PainPoints","text":"PainPoints","type":"text","quickTestValue":"In the job openings they mentioned that part of work is to improve user notifications system. They are looking for ML engineers to work with Python in AWS ecosystem."},{"id":"CoopTechBenefits","text":"CoopTechBenefits","type":"text","quickTestValue":"Building scalable systems
Incorporating AI into existing products
Building fluid and responsive UI on mobile platforms
"},{"id":"RelevantExpertise","text":"RelevantExpertise","type":"text","quickTestValue":"Enhancing Message Channels on Web and Mobile Platforms: We partnered with a client in the social media industry to enhance message channels on Web and mobile platforms. By implementing high-frequency notifications, actionable push notifications, and recap features using technologies such as Kotlin and Firebase, the solutions resulted in higher click-through rates for notifications and emails, significant increases in user interactions, reduced notification disables, and 97% positive user sentiment.

We developed a web-based application in the AI and machine learning sector to help clients assess candidates' sentiments during interviews by detecting positive, neutral, and negative facial expressions in real time. We implemented a machine learning model with over 84% accuracy, utilizing technologies like Python, Flask, React.ts, Electron.js, and RabbitMQ. The solution included a web service for video handling and an Electron app, successfully demonstrated at a major AI & Big Data Expo.

In the telecommunications industry, a client needed to handle AI and ML-driven insights from transcribed audio conversations between voice agents and customers. We deployed an event-driven microservice architecture using AWS, Kafka, Java, Docker, and Kubernetes. This solution enhanced the client's system functionality and improved data processing capabilities, contributing to the ongoing development and scalability of their voice services."}],"data":[],"output":{"formats":["text"]}},"modelParameters":{"modelType":"default","gptParameters":{"temperature":0}},"settings":{"recordRetrievalLimit":100,"shouldPreserveRecordLinks":null}}

{"version":"GptDynamicPrompt-2","prompt":[{"type":"literal","text":"Instruction: 
You are a subject matter expert in software development. Your task is to analyze the provided company research and deliver precise, well-structured single-paragraph answers to the following questions. Ensure your responses are clear, concise, and grounded in the details from the research. Use clear software development English in all your answers.

First, focus on information about the lead (their potential pain points, technical expertise, etc.), and only then on information about the company as a whole.

Questions: 
1. Summarize the company's activities in software development. 
2. Identify their likely pain points in software development. 
3. Determine the specific technical expertise they would benefit from.

Output format: 
Provide each answer as a separate paragraph, labeled with the respective question: "summary", "painPoints", "technicalExpertise"

---
 "},{"type":"inputVariable","id":"text"},{"type":"literal","text":" "}],"definitions":{"inputs":[{"id":"text","text":"text","type":"text","quickTestValue":"Veeranagouda Mukkanagoudar / Hinge Health

 

The lead is Sr Engineering Manager @ Hinge Health | Data, API & Backend

Working at Hinge Health since Nov 2021.

 

Company info
Hinge Health is moving people beyond pain by transforming the way it is treated and prevented. Connecting people digitally and in-person with expert clinical care, we combine advanced technology, AI and a care team of experts to guide people through personalized care directly from their phone.

 

Total employee count: 1,569

Locations: CA, US; CAN: India

11 engineering positions in the US and CAN

303 engineers with -7% of increase per 1 yr

 

Products
Digital MSK Care Programs:

Treatment for back, joint, and muscle pain.

Personalized care plans using digital tools and wearable sensors.

Physical Therapy:

Virtual physical therapy sessions guided by licensed clinicians.

Behavioral Health Support:

Cognitive-behavioral therapy (CBT) to address chronic pain and related mental health challenges.

Wearable Technology:

Motion sensors for real-time feedback during exercise sessions.

Telehealth Services:

Access to board-certified physicians for diagnoses and treatment recommendations.

Coaching and Educational Support:

One-on-one coaching from health professionals.

Educational resources to support long-term health improvements.

Pain Management Solutions:

Non-invasive approaches to reduce reliance on medication or surgery.

Products Reviews 
Positive Feedback:

On the Apple App Store, Hinge Health holds a 4.9 out of 5-star rating based on approximately 64,500 reviews, with users praising its effectiveness and convenience.
 Apple Apps Store

Members have reported significant pain reduction and improved mobility, attributing these benefits to the program's personalized exercise therapy and supportive coaching.
 Hinge Health

Negative Feedback:

The Better Business Bureau (BBB) reflects a 1.5 out of 5-star rating for Hinge Health, based on 10 customer reviews.
 Better Business Bureau

Some users have expressed dissatisfaction with billing practices and communication, citing unexpected charges and aggressive marketing tactics.
 Complaints Board

Job snippets
On the Leads Team

 Staff Data Engineer

8+ years of experience building data pipelines using Spark, Kafka, Airflow

6+ years of experience working with SQL and Python

6+ years of experience processing and storing large scale data using distributed systems as well as a mastery of database designs and data warehousing

4+ years of experience working with broad spectrum of data stores like PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, Snowflake and Redshift

Senior Data Engineer

4+ years of experience working with broad spectrum of data stores like PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, Snowflake and Redshift

4+ years of experience building data pipelines using Spark, Kafka, Airflow

6+ years of software engineering experience and 4+ in data engineering

Mastery of SQL and Python4

 

 

Senior Software Engineer - Frontend

4+ years of experience with React/TypeScript

2+ years of experience with React Native or native mobile development

Experience with distributed microservices architecture built in Docker containers utilizing Node.js/Typescript and/or Ruby on Rails

Principal Software Engineer - AI/ML

Expertise with the AI/ML ecosystems at the PhD level and equally with Product managers and executive leadership teams to ensure iterative progress in a fast-paced environment

Experience working with Healthcare/Personally Identifiable (PII) Data, and building healthcare compliant (HIPAA) data lakes

Strong expertise with distributed Architecture, with deep exposure to API design & versioning, domain-driven design, event-driven systems, and microservices that serve both web and mobile frontends

Types of Eng Job Openings
Software engineer, Principal, Data"}],"data":[],"output":{"formats":["json"],"jsonSchema":{"type":"object","properties":{"summary":{"type":"string"},"painPoints":{"type":"string"},"technicalExpertise":{"type":"string"}}},"jsonExamples":[{"summary":"Hinge Health specializes in software development focused on digital musculoskeletal (MSK) care programs, providing personalized treatment for back, joint, and muscle pain through advanced technology, AI, and a dedicated care team. Their offerings include virtual physical therapy, cognitive-behavioral therapy, wearable technology for real-time feedback, telehealth services, and educational support aimed at improving long-term health outcomes. The company has a strong presence in the digital health space, leveraging data and technology to enhance patient care and engagement.","painPoints":"Hinge Health may face challenges related to customer satisfaction, as indicated by the low rating on the Better Business Bureau, which highlights issues with billing practices and communication. Additionally, the company might struggle with scaling its engineering team effectively, given the recent decrease in engineering positions and the need to maintain high-quality software development while managing user feedback and expectations.","technicalExpertise":"To enhance its software development capabilities, Hinge Health would benefit from expertise in data engineering, particularly in building robust data pipelines and managing large-scale data using technologies like Spark, Kafka, and Airflow. Additionally, proficiency in API design, microservices architecture, and compliance with healthcare regulations (such as HIPAA) would be crucial. Strengthening skills in frontend development with React/TypeScript and mobile development would also support their digital health initiatives."}]}},"modelParameters":{"modelType":"gpt-35-turbo","gptParameters":{"temperature":0}},"settings":{"recordRetrievalLimit":30,"shouldPreserveRecordLinks":null}}
